typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		movie as string,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as string,
		Rating as string,
		RottenTomato as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 derive(P01_Ind = 'P01_Ind',
		P02_Ind = 'P02_Ind',
		P03_Ind = 'P03_Ind') ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 unpivot(output(
		Indicator as string,
		P01_Ind as string,
		P02_Ind as string,
		P03_Ind as string
	),
	ungroupBy(movie),
	lateral: false,
	ignoreNullPivots: false) ~> Unpivot1
